description: {x
{*This might be the last fight of Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{*r.  Show the world what you
are capable of and destroy this evil being.  Good luck and may the
{wG{*ods still be on your side.  Not many fools like you got this far,
feel proud, but don't lose your head.  Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{*r might just eat it.{x
{*A strong guard can be seen through a small hole in the northern door,
guarding the treasures of this {RC{rrypt{*.{x{x
3698.name: {8The {RC{rrypt{8 of Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{8r{x

description: {w
{*The source of the str{range light seems to {*be deeper in the Crypts.
To the south a fain{rt green glow of the carv{*ings can still be seen.
East the growling{r of a dark creature can be h{*eard, and its glowing
red eyes can be see{rn. It seems to guard the{* different directions
the hallway goes. Pil{res with bones and fl{*esh lie around the guard.
3657.name: {rFurther{* in the {rhallway{x

description: {w
{*Strange carvings, emitting a {gpa{Gl{ge g{Gr{ge{Ge{gn{* glow, fill the walls.
{w
{*       N{wo{rr{wt{*h you will find what you des{re{*rve.
{r         De{Ra{rth
{*       S{wo{ru{wt{*h you will find what you a{rr{*e.
{r         Not{Rh{ring{x
{w
{*An unnatural light sh{rines from the north,{* illuminating the strange
carvings on the wal{rl. The aw{gfu{Gl s{gme{rll is st{*ill here, but here are
no corpses and bo{rnes. The {gf{Ga{gi{Gnt gr{ge{Ge{gn {rlight t{*he {wcarvings{* emit and
the light from the {rnorth pro{gduc{Ge{g lo{rng shado{*ws on the dusty ground.
The hallway continues{r to the north and so{*uth, north is more light.
3656.name: {rIn the {*dark{r hallway{x

description: {w
{*The hallway is decora{rted with strange car{*vings and illuminated by
burning torches.  T{rhe fire flickers and shi{*mmers, dancing with an
unnatural force. {rThe skeletons of foolish tra{*velers are shattered
across the hallway.{r To the south a peaceful{* sensation can be felt
but the east is repel{rlent, rotting corpse{*s spread an awful smell.
3654.name: {rIn{* a dark {rhallway{x

description: {x
{yThe small ladder here leads back to the steaming Crypts.  The cavern is
{wice cold and the smell is unbearable.  The gray walls show drawings
{yof various vampiric rituals.  Some are about religion and sacrificing,
{wsome are about hunting.  None of these rituals is very pleasant.{x
3691.name: {rLadder{* to the {rCatacombs{x

description: {x
{*The hallway takes a quick turn and continues west and south. The
{rlight to the west is still visible. To the south the hallway seems
{rto suddenly stop. No exits can be seen there, except for the way
{*back. Carvings on the wall: '{wDeath may be closer then expected.{*'
3674.name: {rTurn{* in the {rHallway{x

description: {x
{*The light becomes bri{rghter a{Rnd the{r sound {*of hammering louder. The
flat black walls wo{ruld ma{Rke everybody{r depre{*ssive. From time to time
screaming can be he{rard fr{Rom the deepe{rr Cata{*combs. Many brave souls
have lost their lives{r here a{Rnd man{ry will {*lose it here in the future.
3660.name: {rBelow{* a small {rstairway{x

description: {x
{8This dark {RC{rrypt{8 is the home of {8Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{8r{8, {wL{8ord of the {RU{rndead{8.  The
{8dungeon is almost totally empty and a large door seals the eastern
{8exit.  It is too late to turn back, destiny awaits, and it looks like
{8someone else is waiting too.  The {wG{8ods wish you good luck with this.{x
3694.name: {8The {RC{rrypt{8 of Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{8r{x

description: {x
{*The hallway stops as it intersects with another hallway.  Even
{wthose without any special abilities in detecting sinfulness, can
{*feel a strong evil source somewhere north of here.  West leads
{wback out of here, and that way might be a smart decision.  South
{*leads to an unknown place, north obviously to something very Evil.{x
3683.name: {rCenter{* of the {rCrypts{x

description: {x
{wHere is the source of the strange light. A small torch is burning,
{*but with a unusual green glow. The flames do not move and almost
{gseem fake, but if one would touch the flames he or she would notice
{*that the flames are not fake and burn with an incredible heat. The
{wcavern leads south to an unknown location, the source of the strong
{gaura and also back north, to the hallway higher in the Undead Crypts.
3670.name: {rStrange Light{x

description: {x
{wThe cavern here is illuminated by the torch to the north, but the
{8chamber east of here is shrouded by an unnatural darkness. The amount
{gof corpses in this part is even greater then in the beginning of the
{8cavern. The aura almost makes it impossible to go east, even taking a
{wsmall step is easier said than done. The source must be there. It is
{gdifficult to imagine the creature or object that possess such power.{x
3671.name: {rClose{* to the {rEnd{x

description: {x
{wThe strange glow becomes brighter, the hallway darker. Screaming
{yand yelling can be heard from deep in the catacombs. Luckily it is
{*possible to reach the small opening in the ceiling. The walls are
{yas dark as the night, even with the flickering of flames that can
{wbe seen to the south. The smell of dead bodies is still present.
3676.name: {rUnder{* the {rOpening{x

description: {x
{wThe strange smell becomes stronger and a sudden heat fills the
{yroom.  The center of these catacombs comes closer and closer.  The
{*flames, that can be seen west of here, show their magical faces,
{yscreaming and yelling.  The hallway makes a turn to the south, and
{wsmall stair can be seen there, leading down.  '{*Die foolish mortals{w'
3679.name: {rTurn {*in the {rHall{x

description: {x
{*This chamber is apparently a secret room in these Crypts. The door is
{wtotally invisible, unless the exact location is known.  In the center
{rof the room stands a chest, locked. The chest is enormous and capable
{Rof holding a gigantic treasure.   The dust everywhere shows that this
{rroom has not been used for a long time.  The walls are decorated with
{wred stripes and strange markings.  The symbols probably say something
{*about the chamber or about the box, but their meaning remains unknown.
{wThe only symbol that is also used by the elves is that of immortality.{x
3662.name: {RH{ri{*d{wd{re{Rn {RR{*o{ro{wm{x

description: {x
{*Occasionally the soun{rd of met{Ral o{rn metal {*can be heard. A faint red
light, most likely {rcaused b{Ry a smal{rl fire c{*oming from the north,
enlightens the wall{rs. The w{Ralls are{r totally{* flat and black. The
hallway continues nor{rth to th{Re so{rund, and{* also leads back south.
3659.name: {rNorth{* of the {rIntersection{x

description: {x
{wLight is a good thing to have in dark dungeons or catacombs, but
{ysomehow this light can not give travelers any happiness, comfort or
{*warmth.  The black walls absorb the light and the unnatural flames
{yseem to have faces.  A strange feeling overwhelms you.  The hallway
{wcontinues to the north and the east.  '{*May Darkness Guide Your Path{w'
3678.name: {rAnother {*source of {rLight{x

description: {x
{wThis small cavern is even darker then the upper hallway.  The awful
{*smell of sulfur penetrates everything.  The source seems to be south
{gof here, deeper in the cavern.  A powerful aura can be felt there,
{*that seems to come from an evil creature. The beast must be strong:
{w{gthe ground is covered with half-eaten corpses, bones and flesh.
3666.name: {rBelow {*the small {ropening{x

description: {x
{8Immediately after th{re sta{Rirs stop, the hall{rway t{8akes a turn to the
{8east.  It is now {rclea{Rr that the source of the {rlight{8 is a small fire
{8somewhere around {rthe c{Rorner of the hallway.  T{rhe da{8ngerous stairway
{8leads back into the {rdeepe{Rr Crypts of the Un{rdead.{x
3661.name: {rAt the top{* of the {rstairway{x

description: {x
{wThe terrible smell becomes stronger and stronger.  The corpses here
{*are even more disgusting.  The evil aura fills the cavern with a scary
{gatmosphere and a lot of determination is needed to keep moving.  The
{*walls must have been smooth once, but currently they are damaged and
{wthe floor is partially caved in.  The debris from the walls and floor
{gis not always easy to pass.  The cavern takes a turn to the east here.
3667.name: {rDeeper{* in the {rCavern{x

description: {w
{*At this point, three di{rrections can be chosen{*. The unusual light seems
to come from the east{r. Through the northern hal{*lway come strange sounds,
of metal on metal, al{rmost like somebody is crea{*ting tools. To the west
is nothing but darkness{r, it is not likely one{* would find anything there.{x
3658.name: {rIntersection{* in the {rCrypts{x

description: {x
{*It is a trap!  This place is not sacred, nothing in these Crypts is.
{rA strong enemy lives here, and the peaceful hallway is just to lure
{*his prey.  The corpses are all here, against the walls.  Only those
{rwho were lucky to find him away ever left this place, dead or alive.{x
3687.name: {rTrap!{x

description: {x
{yA small ladder leads up to the cavern of the lich.  The smell becomes
{wmore intense and sickening.  It turns colder and colder and there is
{yhardly any light here.  The passage east leads back to the Crypts.
{w       A small sign is posted here. '{yHouse of Protazur{w'{x
3690.name: {rLadder{* to a {rCavern{x

description: {x
{*The hallway stops and the only way to continue here is either by
{rgoing back, or by entering the strange gap in the floor.  A small
{*light shimmers around the corner to the north, and also below the
{rhole the flickering of flames can be seen.  The wall is inscribed
{*with a short advice for travelers: '{wDown lies what you deserve!{*'{x
3675.name: {rHole {*in the {rFloor{x

description: {x
{yThe cavern narrows and the end seems near.  The ladder to the west
{wis the last chance to escape.  The rumors about this place never
{yspoke of any survivors, so be prepared to fight your last fight.
{wNever underestimate a person who is already dead.  Keep that in mind.{x
3692.name: {rDeep{* in the {rCavern{x

description: {x
{yIt is less warm here, but the awful smell increases.  The small passage
{wleads north, to a cavern and south back to the Crypts.  The gray walls
{yare covered with dust and blood, and corpses lie here, rotting away on
{wthe floor.  Rumors say a powerful lich lives in the Cave north of here.{x
3689.name: {rHallway{* to a {rCavern{x

description: {x
{wThe cavern continues to the south and west. A strange light can be
{*seen to the south, illuminating the damaged walls. The strong aura
{gmakes thinking, walking and concentrating more difficult. The deep
{*darkness seems to fight a battle it can not win with the light here.
3669.name: {rLight{* to the {rSouth{x

description: This room has a strang{re atmosphere. This r{*oom is as dark as the
previous one, but so{rmehow more relaxing. The{* screaming heard to
the north is not f{rrightening from here, and th{*e floor and walls
look clean and dry. {rCompared to the other pl{*aces in the Crypts,
this seems a nice plac{re to rest. There is {*no way to go back up.{x
3653.name: {rUnder {*the {rfloor{x

description: {x
{*The whole room is filled with all kinds of swords, lances, armor, and
{r  other tools.  In the center stands a big anvil, next to it a huge
{R   and incredibly hot fire and on the other site a large bath full
{r        of water. This blacksmith is famous under the Undead.
{*                 South leads back to the stairway.{x
3664.name: {rBlacksmith{x

description: {w
{*The walls that surroun{rd this dark place, a{*re engraved with strange
symbols. The floor s{reems damaged by the many{* ages it survived. All
light is absorbed by{r the dark walls, the nig{*ht seems to live here.
Many corpses lie on th{re ground. The last c{*hance to escape, is up.
3652.name: {rDescent {*to the {rCrypts{x {W[{CC{*laimpoin{Ct{W]{x

description: {x
{*The hallway continues north and south, but Evil can be felt down
{where.  A small inscription is written here in the wall:
{x
{g'Those who decide to return now, will find themselves trapped in
{g a dungeon without exits.  Only the bravest will be able to
{g fight their way out. May Light and Nature guide your path.'
{y                      - Eladamyr, Lord of Trees.{x
3688.name: {rPoint{* of no {rReturn{x

description: {x
{*The hallway itself stops, but a small staircase, leading down, can
{ybe seen.  The readable part of the messages on the walls are still
{*very unpleasant, the other part must be horrible. Written in blood,
{ythese are some of the words found on the walls: '{wYou will soon find
your ultimate destiny{*' and '{wYou will become more here then you have
{wever been{y' and '{wThe only reason Light exists is to create Shadows{y'.{x
3680.name: {rStaircase {*leading {rdown{x

description: {x
{yThe cavern suddenly ends.  This is the hideout of a powerful lich,
{wnamed Protazur. The rumors about him are not very pleasant. Be ready
{yto suffer and die in his hands, weakened by his enormous fangs.{x
3693.name: {rEnd{* of the {rCavern{x

description: {x
{*The heat, the screaming, the yelling, the smell.  The Crypts become
{wmore threatening.  West leads back to the staircase, east leads deeper
{*into the Crypts. For those with a sixth or seventh sense it is possible
{wto feel the wickedness of the Lord of the Crypts himself here already.{x
3682.name: {rApproaching{* the {rEnd

description: {x
{wThis dark room is totally empty except for a large chest in the middle
{*of the room.  The chest is decorated with the symbols of the undead
{R{rand seems very strong.  A small switch has been attached against the
{*northern wall, and seems to operate some kind of system.  A enormous
{wstone hangs above the room, looking like it can fall down anytime now.{x
3668.name: {wT{*r{re{Ra{rs{Ru{*r{we {wR{ro{Ro{*m{x

description: {w
{*Rotting corpses cover{r the ground and spre{*ad an awful smell. The walls
are decorated with {runknown symbols, that gl{*ow strangely in the dark.
Darkness surrounds {rany fool that tries to e{*nter the Crypts and only
those who are blessed{r with a fearless hea{*rt would dare to continue.
3655.name: {rDeeper {*in the {rCrypts{x

description: {x
{*Not many fools like you have made it this far, maybe you have been
underestimated by the Lord himself.  But do not worry, you will run
out of luck soon enough.  Here is another chance to prove yourself in
combat.  Remember, the {wG{*ods are on your side now, Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{*r is not.{x
3695.name: {8The {RC{rrypt{8 of Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{8r{x

description: {x
{wThis hallway, that leads away from the center, is not as dark as
{ythe rest of the Crypts.  A burning torch illuminates the hall and
{wshows the smallest details of the walls.  East leads to am unknown
{yplace.  North would bring a traveler back to the absurd hot center.{x
3684.name: {rSouth{* of the {rCenter{x

description: {x
{*Here is finally a source of light. The glow of the burning torch
{renlightens the hallway and the bones of burned explorers confirm
{rthe many rumors about this place. It is said that the emperor of
{*the undead is protected by many traps and deadly undead 'things'.
3673.name: {rLight{* in the {rDarkness{x

description: {x
{wThis is the room where the Guardian of the Chest waits for any{x
{*intruders.  He has never been challenged so far, but it looks like{x
{rthat has changed.  Remember that this Guard is not pretty, but very{x
{*strong.  He will not let living beings pass.{x
3677.name: {wG{ru{Ra{rr{wd {wR{*oo{wm{x

description: {x
{*The hallway continues{r east and west. The {*smell of sulfur comes
from a opening to t{rhe down. The gap is just{* big enough to crawl
through. Screaming {rcan be heard to the east{*. West leads back to
the intersection. The{r opening down leads {*to an unknown location.{x
3665.name: {rSmall{* opening {rDown{x

description: {x
{gThe smell and the heat slowly become less, luckily. This place seems
{ysacred compared to the rest of the Crypts. The walls are still black,
{gbut somehow the atmosphere here is much more peaceful and relaxing,
{ythe floors are clean, not covered with blood, bones and rotting flesh.{x
3685.name: {rAway{* from the {rCenter{x

description: {x
{*The black walls absorb the last light that reaches this place.  Maybe
you are not as stupid as you look.  The chance this was luck, is quite
small, but if it was, then this will be your last fight. Fight well,
with the {wG{*ods on your side.  Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{*r will not let you go any further.{x
3696.name: {8The {RC{rrypt{8 of Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{8r{x

description: {x
{gThe small gap in the ceiling is smooth and clean, and so is the room.
{wThe light seems to come through the walls and the temperature is
{gcomfortable.  There is an exit south, but it is impossible to see
{wwhat lies there.  This place does not belong here, it is too friendly.{x
3686.name: {rSilence{x

description: {x
{wFinally the cavern ends. The source of the strong aura is here,{x
{*lying on the ground. It is hard to imagine that a little stone like{x
{gthat gem can have such a power. However, the gem is not the reason {x
{*of all those corpses and bones. There must be something else here,{x
{wsomething that spreads the terrible smell of sulfur in this cavern.{x
3672.name: {rCircle{* of the {rAura{x

description: {x
{*The halls here are clean, black and empty.  No messages or blood
{wcover the walls, nor any dust.  The end of the catacombs seems to
{*come closer and closer.  The heat coming from the east makes wearing
{warmor almost unbearable.  At this moment, water is your only friend.{x
3681.name: {rDeeper{* in the {rCrypts{x

description: {x
{*The sound stopped{r, and {Rthe silence fills {rthe ha{*llway. The fire
ahead is stil{rl flick{Rering, and the black wal{rls show{* absolutely no
carvings or a{rny oth{Rer inscription that might {rhelp a{* lost traveler.
North leads to th{re smal{Rl fire, west goes {rback t{*o the stairs.
3663.name: {rSouth{* of the {rMetal smith{x

description: {x
{*The {RC{rrypts{* become darker and darker.  Things are getting confusing.
Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{*r has never fought here, never someone got this far.  But have
no fear, soon you will join those who already died here, he is not so
easy to kill as you might think.  But you have the {wG{*ods on your side.{x
3697.name: {8The {RC{rrypt{8 of Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{8r{x

description:
{*Dethecus is the guardian of the {wD{*eeper {wC{*rypts of the {RU{rndead{*.  He
will give his life before he lets anyone pass this point.
3652.room_name: {*A large, strong vampire is standing here.{x
3652.name: {RD{*et{rhe{*c{ru{Rs{x~

description:
The {YAn{Wg{Yel{C is hurt, and looks very helpless...  How did a holy
person as an angel ever end up in this cursed place?  She looks like
she could use someone with healing powers very badly...  {x
3653.room_name: An {YAn{Wg{Yel{x with a broken wing is trying to get out!
3653.name: {WAn {YAn{Wg{Yel{x~

description:
{*A magic circle has been drawn in blood upon the floor.  Powerful dark{x
{*magic radiates from the circle and prevents any passage into the chamber{x
{*below.{x
3654.room_name: {*A {Rm{ra{*g{ri{Rc c{ri{*rc{rl{Re{* formed of symbols of {Rd{reath {*covers the floor.
3654.name: {*the {Rm{ra{*g{ri{Rc c{ri{*rc{rl{Re{x~
subroutines:
M act 3658 drops a holy stone of negation~
M exall 3656 5~

description:
{*This person is completely protected by dark plate armor.  His or
her face is hidden behind a strong helmet, and a large sword rests in
its hands.  This guard has been summoned here by Morthazar to defend
the Crypts in these difficult times.  {x {x {x
3655.room_name: {*A guardian in full plate armor has been summoned here to protect the {rCrypts{*.{x
3655.name: {*a {rcrypt {*guardian{x~

3656.name: {*-unused-{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
{*This man is the smith of the Crypts.  He is well known, and famous
under the undead.  In his hands is hammer, by his side are various
tools to create weapons and armor.  {x
3664.room_name: {*A vampiric metalworker stands here, creating a dark dagger.{x
3664.name: {wA{*r{ra{Rmi{rr{*a{wk{*, the {RC{rr{Ry{rp{Rt {wS{*mith{x~
subroutines:
M death 3603 100~
M greet 3664 100~
M give 3665 3659~
M speech 3666 reward~

3601.name: [{YIMP INVIS{x] undeadcompleter run completer{x~
subroutines: M act 3606 opens a large chest~

description:
A shimmering barrier of dark magic completely blocks any passage
through the doorway.  Anyone wishing to pass will have to find
another way around.
3602.room_name: {*An impenetrable seal of darkness blocks the eastern door.{x
3602.name: the impenetrable seal~

3603.name: {*a {Yl{yin{wge{yri{Yng p{yre{wse{ync{Ye{*~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M random 3613 50~

3668.name: [{YIMP INVIS{x] switch operator~
subroutines: M act 3668 unlocks a small switch operated by a key~

description:
{8This large demon is the leader of the demons.  His power is
{8enormous and he is also a good friend of Morthazar.  His teeth are
{8yellow and he smells awful.  A large axe rest in his hands.  {x
3672.room_name: {*A huge demon stands here, summoned by his Lord {*Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{*r, to defend the key.{x
3672.name: {wB{*a{rk{Ra{ym{Ru{rr{*a{wl{(, {RL{re{*a{wd{*e{rr{* of the {wD{re{Rm{ro{*n{ws{x~

description:
{8This strong undead guard has served here for many centuries.  His
{8power is still increasing, he trains hard, but so far he has never
{8been challenged.  He guards the treasures these Crypts hold.{x
3677.room_name: {*The {wG{*uardian of the {rC{Rh{re{Rs{rt{* of the {wU{rn{Rd{re{wa{*d patrols here.{x
3677.name: {*the {wG{*uardian of the {rC{Rh{re{Rs{rt{* of the {wU{rn{Rd{re{wa{*d{x~
subroutines:
M death 3679 100~
M grall 3677 100~
M exall 3678 1~

description:
{*With bloody and deathly fangs, this vampire is even feared by his
own brothers.  He has no mercy and his slender body is much stronger
then it seems to be.  His eyes have a red glow, burning with desire to
eat his next victim.  {x
3687.room_name: {*A vampire, covered with blood, has been summoned here to defend the Crypts.{x
3687.name: {rU{yt{ra{Rl{rr{yu{rn{yd {*the {wV{*a{rm{Rp{ri{*r{we{x~

description:
{*This powerful man is the personal bodyguard of Morthazar.  He{x
{*is dressed in full plate mail and carries a simple yet strong and{x
{*lethal sword.  He is trained to protect and to kill.  His {x
{*Master's wish is his command.{x
3690.name: {*a strong De{wa{*th Kn{wig{*ht{x~

description:
{*This lich is a strong fighter and a worthy oppenent for anyone. 
His speed and balance are as lethal as his fangs and his mind beats
both his speed and fangs.  {x
3693.name: {yP{wr{*o{rt{Ra{rz{*u{yr{* the {RP{ro{*w{we{*r{rf{Ru{rl {*L{wic{*h{x~

description:
{8You are standing before one of the most dangerous beings in the
{8Realms.  {8The mighty Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{8r, The strongest undead creature in
{8existence.  {8Death itself surrounds him.  There is nothing that 
{8will please him more {8than killing you!{x
3694.name: {*Mo{rrt{Rha{rza{*r{X~
subroutines:
M exall 3670 0~
M exall 3670 1~
M fight 3686 100~
M grall 3688 100~
M death 3685 100~

description:
{wT{*e{rr{Rr{wa{Rc{rh{*u{ws{*, {wG{*uardian of the {RC{rr{Ry{rp{Rt{rs{*, is one of the very few Morthazar
trusts.  He is here to defend the Crypts against any attacker and he
has never failed so far.  Many stinking corpses and bones lie around
him, as a warning for those who are foolish enough to enter.  {x
3698.room_name: {*A huge armored black knight stands here to defend the crypt against attackers.{x
3698.name: {wT{*e{rr{Rr{wa{Rc{rh{*u{ws{*{x~
subroutines:
M death 3610 5~
M exall 3661 1~
M exall 3661 0~
